item.title: (RELEASE) Set Of Corrupt Weapons (RELEASE)
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

frogtamer101:

JJ A little harsh there man people actually like this armour and the man did take the time to go and find every one of those wield and drop odels plus he had to tweak them just a bit. and hes giving the int. If you wish to start telling him his long hard owrk was completely usleess lets see you try it. Its quite painful work.

Are you really saying a cant find a model, capoy and paste ints and post it here??

[quote=“Michaelmmm, post:8, topic:284133”][quote author=frogtamer101 link=topic=375571.msg2829950#msg2829950 date=1245304852]
JJ A little harsh there man people actually like this armour and the man did take the time to go and find every one of those wield and drop odels plus he had to tweak them just a bit. and hes giving the int. If you wish to start telling him his long hard owrk was completely usleess lets see you try it. Its quite painful work.
[/quote] Thank you, it was actually quite painful, it’s basically my second release EVER, other than the highway man -_-’[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 06:04:57 am[/size][hr][quote author=jjones10 link=topic=375571.msg2829937#msg2829937 date=1245304179]

[quote author=Michaelmmm link=topic=375571.msg2829858#msg2829858 date=1245301075]

[quote author=jjones10 link=topic=375571.msg2829820#msg2829820 date=1245300347]
What the hell? Even worse than a recolor… You didn’t do shit!
[/quote] Dude this has nothing to do with recoloring?!?!?!? go to runescape and search corrupt dragon in there grand exchange. incase u dont know what it is, IT’S ACTUAL A ITEM IN RS. It’s like a f2p test dragon armor that degrades when worn -.- and thanks for the comment corrupt took forever to find and to postion those models in the inv[/quote]

Yeah i know that. That is why its worse than a recolor… You did NOTHING at all. and claimed credit for copy and pasting ints from CJ’s tutorial…
Seriously, this is the worst kind of post in this section.
//mod lock
[/quote]Wow dude? i’m only trying to help people, other than this post i’ve NEVER seen corrupt weapons released on any website in the model section before?[/quote]
And Michaelmmm thats because no one wants them. And if they did, they would find it themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: (RELEASE) Set Of Corrupt Weapons (RELEASE)
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

Hi, I Gzipped and made CORRECT Ints, and fixed there view in the INV so there Correct.
Tell me what you think!! Comment Please!!

NOTE: Picture done in 1 minutes i kno it looks like shit -.-

LINK-http://uppit.com/v/TRW68EED (Contains Ints + Models)

But Just Incase, Ints:

[code]if(i == 1530)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 4229; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 4230; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 4230; // Female Wield
class8.anInt181 = 1600; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 400; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Corrupt DB Axe”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “Corrupt Dragon BattleAxe By: Michaelmmm”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
}

if(i == 1532)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 4226; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 4225; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 4225; // Female Wield
class8.anInt181 = 700; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
